## Instrument Information
- **Vendor:** [e.g., Waters, Agilent, Thermo Fisher]
- **Model:** [e.g., ACQUITY UPLC H-Class]
- **Instrument Type:** [e.g., HPLC, GC/MS, LC/MS]
- **Software:** [e.g., Empower 3, ChemStation]
- **Software Version:** [e.g., 3.7.2]

## File Format
- **Extension:** [e.g., .arw, .d, .raw]
- **Format Type:** [e.g., Binary, Folder with multiple files, XML]

- [ ] No, but I can describe the format
